revision.text: {{Wired embedded system |brand=QNAP |model=HS-210 |upc=885022004911 |asin=B00H3VBKBM |newegg=N82E16822107145 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |availability=EoL (12/31/2020) |price=290 |est_release_date=11/2013 |type=NAS enclosure |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=5 |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.5 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6282 |cpu1_cspeed=1.6 GHz |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=N25Q128A |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ2G83CFR-PBC |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, USB 3.0, SATA II |expansion_usb_num=4 |expansion_sata_num=2 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1318 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2-Wire RTC IC;Seiko;S35390A;;1;,,, System Controller IC;Microchip;PIC16F690;;1;,,, USB 3.0 Host Controller;EtronTech;EJ168A;;1;,,, 2Kbit I2C 2-wire Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24C02C;;1;,,, 4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1;,,, USB 2.0 SD/MMC Flash Card Reader IC;Genesys Logic;GL823;;1;,,, 30V 9A P-Channel MOSFET;Advanced Power Electronics;AP4435GM;;1;,,, 1MHz 4.5A Peak Current-Limit Step-Down Regulator;Marvell;88PG847B;;1; |flags=SD Card slot, RTC w/ battery, buzzer, power switch, heatsink |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.4;Marvell 3.5.3; |stock_os=Linux;3.4.6;QTS 4.2.2; |tp_firmware=Debian |default_ip=169.254.100.100 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui_eth=00:08:9B }} {{TagLine|Silent & Fanless NAS}} :[https://www.qnap.com/en-us/product/hs-210 Product page] {{â€¢}} [https://www.qnap.com/en-us/download?model=hs-210 Download Center] "QW01" and "V1.2" are silkscreened on the board. ===Reviews=== *[https://www.techadvisor.com/review/qnap-hs-210-review-3543713/ ''QNAP HS-210'' Review on '''Tech Advisor'''] *[https://www.techspot.com/review/767-qnap-hs-210/ ''QNAP HS-210 Silent NAS'' Review on '''Tech Spot'''] *[https://www.tweaktown.com/reviews/6068/qnap-hs-210-2-bay-media-sharing-nas-review-reduced-in-size-for-your-living-room/index.html ''QNAP HS-210 2-Bay Media Sharing NAS'' Review on '''TweakTown'''] ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6282 @1.6GHz (''Armada 300'' ARM V5) *Memory: 512MB (SDRAM) DDR3 *Storage: 16MB SPI NOR Flash, 2x SATA II, SD Card Slot *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *USB: 2x USB 2.0 (Type A), 2x USB 3.0 (Type A) *Power: 12V, 5A via barrel ==Images== ---- File:QNAP HS-210 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:QNAP HS-210 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
